ST02-001.name: Eustass 'Captain' Kid ST02-001
ST02-001.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] ③ You may trash 1 card from your hand: Set this Leader as active.

ST02-003.name: Urouge ST02-003
ST02-003.effect: [DON!! x1] If you have 3 or more Characters, this card gains +2000 power.

ST02-005.name: Killer ST02-005
ST02-005.effect: [On Play] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less. [Trigger] Play this card.

ST02-007.name: Jewelry Bonney ST02-007
ST02-007.effect: [Activate: Main] ➀ You may rest this Character: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Supernovas} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

ST02-008.name: Scratchmen Apoo ST02-008
ST02-008.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards.

ST02-009.name: Trafalgar Law ST02-009
ST02-009.effect: [On Play] Set up to 1 of your {Supernovas} or {Heart Pirates} type rested Characters with a cost of 5 or less as active.

ST02-010.name: Basil Hawkins ST02-010
ST02-010.effect: [DON!! x1] [Once Per Turn] [Your Turn] If this Character battles your opponent's Character, set this card as active.

ST02-013.name: Eustass 'Captain' Kid ST02-013
ST02-013.effect: [Blocker] [DON!! x1] [End of Your Turn] Set this card as active.

ST02-014.name: X. Drake ST02-014
ST02-014.effect: [DON!! x1] [Your Turn] If this Character is rested, your {Supernovas} or {Navy} type Leaders and Characters gain +1000 power.

ST02-015.name: Scalpel ST02-015
ST02-015.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active. [Trigger] Set up to 2 of your DON!! cards as active.

ST02-016.name: Repel ST02-016
ST02-016.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. Then, set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

ST02-017.name: Straw Sword ST02-017
ST02-017.effect: [Main] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters. [Trigger] Play up to 1 {Supernovas} type card with a cost of 2 or less from your hand.
